actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress with respect to implementing the objectives of the United Nations World Assembly on Aging.

summary.text: Urges the President to encourage: (1) Government-wide participation in implementing the recommendations of the United Nations World Assembly on Aging and in planning for the scheduled 1985 review by the United Nations of the implementation of the Vienna International Plan of Action on Aging; (2) the exchange of information and the promotion of research on aging among the States, the Government, international organizations, and other nations; and (3) greater private sector involvement in responding to the concerns of the aging. Urges the President to inform developing nations that the United States recognizes aging as an important issue requiring national attention.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress with respect to implementing the objectives of the United Nations World Assembly on Aging.
